## Description {#details}

Abstraction for a trip count of a loop.

A smaller version of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> class without the concerns of changing the operand representation.

Definition at line 312 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonhardwareloops-cpp">HexagonHardwareLoops.cpp</a>.
